metadata.description: Looking for Olive Garden coupons? 🏷️ We've got the latest promo codes for August 2025, including 20% off, free appetizers, and more. Get your discounts here! 👇
metadata.pageGoal: Provide users with the latest Olive Garden coupons and promo codes to encourage online orders and dine-in visits.

data.h1: Olive Garden Coupons, Promo Codes & Discounts! 🤑
data.tagline: Your ultimate guide to saving BIG at Olive Garden is here! 🚀

data.title: Active Olive Garden Coupons for August 2025 🔥
rows: Get a whopping 20% off your entire check.
Spending more than $30? Get $5 off. Easy peasy.
Get a FREE appetizer when you buy any entrée. What a steal!
Join the Olive Garden eClub and get a FREE dessert on your birthday.

items.question: How do I get Olive Garden coupons?
items.answer: Join the Olive Garden eClub on their website! They'll send exclusive coupons and offers right to your inbox.

items.question: Does Olive Garden have a rewards program?
items.answer: They don't have a traditional rewards program, but the eClub is where it's at for special offers and promotions.
